text: This was the first edition of the tournament. Martin Kližan won the title after defeating Darian King 6–3, 6–3 in the final. ==Seeds== ==Draw== ===Finals=== ===Top half=== ===Bottom half=== ==References== *Main Draw *Qualifying Draw Oracle Challenger Series - Indian Wells - Men's Singles
title: 2018 Oracle Challenger Series – Indian Wells – Men's Singles
